n.Title: The "Invite a Friend" section is not showing up
n.STR: 1.open the application /n 2.select the Cashback and bonuses section in the Main section
n.AR: The "Invite a Friend" section is displayed in the "How to get bonuses" section.
n.ER: "The "Invite a Friend" section is not displayed in the "How to get bonuses" section.
